item.description: 早上好。美联储大幅降息。股票和债券摇摇欲坠全世界都在为这一决定的后果做准备。以下是市场动向以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. The Fed makes a big rate cut. Stocks and bonds falter. The world braces for the decision’s fallout. Here’s what’s moving markets. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Kristine Aquino】

item.title: 金矿商表示，随着交易的升温，他们现在变得有纪律了
item.description: 随着金价创下历史新高，矿业公司又开始寻求交易，同时试图向投资者保证，他们已经从过去过度消费的错误中吸取了教训。【原文：With gold prices at a record high, mining companies are back hunting for deals while trying to reassure investors that they’ve learned from past mistakes of overspending.】

item.title: 交易商消化美联储决议，股票和债券震荡上行：市场综述

item.title: 花旗交易员看准美联储降息，却失望而归
item.description: 阿克谢-辛格（Akshay Singal）对美联储周三的降息判断正确并不感到高兴。【原文：Akshay Singal took little pleasure in getting the Federal Reserve’s rate-cut call right on Wednesday.】

item.title: 日本股指期货上涨，日元跌幅收窄，交易商等待日本央行出台政策
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）警告不要假设大规模降息会继续下去，日元因此收窄涨幅，日本股票期货走高。投资者还在等待日本央行周五的决定。【原文：Japanese stock futures edged higher as the yen pared its gains after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell cautioned against assuming large rate cuts will continue. Investors are also awaiting the Bank of Japan’s decision Friday.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克的 X 通过软件更新绕过巴西禁令
item.description: 巴西互联网供应商协会周三表示，埃隆-马斯克的 X 公司通过自动更新软件，成功绕过了巴西对社交媒体网络的禁令。【原文：Elon Musk’s X managed to bypass a ban of the social media network in Brazil though an automatic update of its software, an association of Brazilian internet providers said Wednesday.】

item.title: 帮助雇用 "临时工 "的人工智能初创公司获得维诺德-科斯拉（Vinod Khosla）的支持
item.description: Vahan.ai是一家人工智能驱动的蓝领工人招聘公司，该公司已获得由硅谷亿万富翁维诺德-科斯拉（Vinod Khosla）的科斯拉风险投资公司（Khosla Ventures）领投的1000万美元融资，将人工智能引入了印度长期以来由母婴业者主导的招聘领域。【原文：Vahan.ai, an AI-powered recruiter of blue-collar workers, has secured $10 million in funding led by Silicon Valley billionaire Vinod Khosla’s Khosla Ventures, bringing artificial intelligence to a hiring segment in India long dominated by mom-and-pop operators.】

item.title: S&P 将 80 亿美元的前景基金评级为负面
item.description: S&P Global Ratings 将 Prospect Capital Corp. 的评级展望调整为负面，理由是对其投资组合中不断增加的损失和非应计贷款表示担忧。【原文：S&P Global Ratings revised its outlook on Prospect Capital Corp. to negative, citing concerns over mounting losses and non-accruing loans in its portfolio.】

item.title: 华尔街新纪元开局不顺，美联储埋下隐患
item.description: 杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的讲话正是华尔街上上下下的交易员们期盼已久的：随着紧缩货币政策时代终于开始逆转，鲍威尔将大幅降息，这将为今年股票和债券的大幅反弹提供理由。【原文：Jerome Powell delivered exactly what traders up and down Wall Street had long hoped for: A big interest-rate cut that would justify this year’s steep rally in stocks and bonds as the era of tight monetary policy finally began to reverse.】

item.title: 被抛弃的债券持有人就重组问题起诉 AMC 娱乐公司
item.description: 一群 AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc. 的票据持有人起诉了这家电影连锁公司，声称 7 月份达成的全面重组协议侵蚀了他们的权利，并优先考虑了更多的次级债券持有人。【原文：A group of AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc.’s noteholders have sued the movie chain company, claiming a sweeping restructuring deal in July eroded their rights and prioritized more junior bondholders.】

item.title: 新西兰猕猴桃银行首席执行官称注资 5 亿新西兰元可启动增长
item.description: 新西兰贷款机构 Kiwibank 首席执行官 Steve Jurkovich 表示，凭借 5 亿新西兰元（约合 3.1 亿美元）的新资本，Kiwibank 将实现大幅增长，并实现政府颠覆银行市场的雄心壮志。【原文：New Zealand lender Kiwibank could grow significantly and achieve the government’s ambitions of disrupting the banking market with NZ$500 million ($310 million) of new capital, Chief Executive Officer Steve Jurkovich said.】

item.title: 德国承诺更严格地审查对以色列的武器出口
item.description: 德国经济部长罗伯特-哈贝克（Robert Habeck）表示，德国计划对其向以色列提供的武器的使用是否违反国际法进行更严格的审查。【原文：Germany plans to take a harder look at whether the weapons it supplies to Israel are not being used in violation of international law, the economy minister, Robert Habeck, said.】

item.title: 丰业银行任命新业务主管以拓展魁北克业务
item.description: 新斯科舍银行（Bank of Nova Scotia）已任命 Jean-Francois Courville 为其魁北克业务总裁，以拓展加拿大第二大省的业务。【原文：Bank of Nova Scotia has appointed Jean-Francois Courville as president of its Quebec operation as it looks to expand in Canada’s second-largest province.】

item.title: 假定的 "加密货币 DeFi 平台运营商与美国证券交易委员会达成和解
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会对 "所谓 "去中心化金融协议公司 Rari Capital Inc. 及其创始人的指控达成和解，指控他们误导投资者，并充当投资平台的未注册经纪人，该平台曾拥有超过 10 亿美元的资产。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission has settled charges against Rari Capital Inc., a “supposed” decentralized finance protocol, and its founders for misleading investors and acting as an unregistered broker for investment platforms that once held more than $1 billion in assets.】

item.title: 肥胖症药物制造商 BioAge 寻求 1.58 亿美元的首次公开募股（IPO）和配售
item.description: BioAge Labs Inc. 是一家开发肥胖症和代谢疾病疗法的临床阶段生物技术公司，该公司正寻求在首次公开募股和私募中筹集高达 1.575 亿美元的资金。【原文：BioAge Labs Inc., a clinical-stage biotechnology company developing therapies for obesity and metabolic disease, is seeking to raise as much as $157.5 million in its initial public offering and a private placement.】

item.title: Gamestop 首席执行官因持有富国银行股票被美国联邦贸易委员会罚款 100 万美元

item.title: Advent 即将向 IN 集团出售 Idemia 生物识别技术部门
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，收购公司 Advent International 即将达成协议，将 Idemia 的欧洲身份验证业务出售给 IN Groupe。【原文：Buyout firm Advent International is nearing an agreement to sell the European identity authentication business of Idemia to IN Groupe, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 加拿大 Desjardins 公司瞄准澳元债券市场首次发行债券
item.description: 北美最大的金融服务合作社 Desjardins 集团正准备在澳元债券市场上首次发行债券，以寻求多元化的资金来源，跟上不断增长的贷款额度。【原文：Desjardins Group is preparing a potential debut issuance in the Australian dollar bond market, as North America’s largest financial services co-operative seeks to diversify its funding sources to keep up with its growing lending book.】

item.title: Uniper 称俄罗斯过境协议结束后欧洲天然气供应稳定
item.description: 德国公用事业公司 Uniper SE 的负责人表示，即使俄罗斯的一条关键天然气过境路线即将关闭，欧洲也有能力在今年冬天保持稳定的能源供应。【原文：Europe is in a strong position to maintain steady energy supplies this winter even as a key Russian gas transit route is set to close, according to the head of German utility Uniper SE.】

item.title: 美联储开盘大动作为股市注入火箭燃料

item.title: Gensler 称人工智能有可能像斯嘉丽-约翰逊的《她》一样令人心碎
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（US Securities and Exchange Commission）主席加里-根斯勒（Gary Gensler）表示，过多的经纪人和基金经理过度使用同类人工智能系统，可能会为未来的动荡埋下隐患。【原文：Overuse of the same kinds of artificial intelligence systems by too many brokers and money managers could set the stage for future turmoil, according to Gary Gensler, chair of the US Securities and Exchange Commission.】

item.title: 律师称，税务举报人获得 7,400 万美元显示了国税局的进步
item.description: 长期以来，举报人律师一直抱怨国内税收署处理逃税线索的时间太长，他们将 7,400 万美元的赔偿金作为改进的标志。【原文：Whistleblower lawyers who have long complained that the Internal Revenue Service takes far too long to process tips about tax evasion are billboarding a $74 million payout as a sign of improvement.】

item.title: 您会绘制点阵图吗？了解美联储如何预测
item.description: 几乎可以肯定，这是金融市场上最受密切关注的散点图。自 2012 年 1 月以来，美联储每三个月就会更新一次 "点阵图"，这让分析师们趋之若鹜。"点阵图 "已成为美国中央银行事实上的货币政策预测—；无论美联储是否希望如此。它也是美联储决策委员会内部不同意见的重要线索来源，尽管它既隐晦又关键。【原文：It’s almost certainly the most closely scrutinized scatter chart in financial markets. Every three months since January 2012, the Federal Reserve has sent analysts scurrying by updating its “dot plot,” which has become the de facto monetary policy forecast of the US central bank — whether the Fed wants it to be or not. It’s also an important source of clues to dissent within the Fed’s policy making committee, even if it can be as cryptic as it is crucial.】

item.title: 克里称石油业尚未证明碳捕集是否可行
item.description: 拜登政府的最高气候外交官约翰-克里（John Kerry）说，石油和天然气行业必须证明碳捕集能够在降低排放方面发挥有意义的作用，否则就会面临比预期更快的摆脱化石燃料的转型。【原文：John Kerry, the Biden administration’s top climate diplomat, said the oil and gas industry must prove carbon capture can play a meaningful role lowering emissions or face a quicker-than-expected transition away from fossil fuels.】

item.title: 特百惠贷款人争夺资产，包括品牌名称
item.description: 在本周二之前，特百惠一直是一个耳熟能详的美国品牌，但已逐渐淡出人们的视线，成为冰箱里储存剩饭剩菜的代名词。现在，随着贷款人和公司在破产法庭上互相争斗，特百惠这个名字本身也将变得更加陈旧。【原文：Until Tuesday, Tupperware had been a familiar, but fading, American brand, synonymous with storing leftovers in the fridge. Now, the name Tupperware itself stands to grow even more stale as lenders fight each other and the company in bankruptcy court.】

item.title: Vista 选择 Evercore 帮助出售 Finastra 的资本市场部门
item.description: 知情人士透露，Vista Equity Partners 正与 Evercore Inc. 合作，帮助出售金融科技公司 Finastra 的财资和资本市场业务。【原文：Vista Equity Partners is working with Evercore Inc. to help sell the fintech Finastra’s Treasury and Capital Markets business, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 高超音速武器及其重要性
item.description: 高超音速武器速度极快，其速度可以改变周围的空气分子。它们可以携带核弹头，低空飞行，难以探测。它们是美国与俄罗斯和中国之间不断升级的竞争的核心。它们在战斗中的使用引起了人们的警惕。乌克兰声称俄罗斯在2024年初使用高超音速导弹攻击基辅。不仅仅是世界军事强国试图用高超音速武器库来引起人们的敬畏：也门胡塞武装叛乱分子就使用了高超音速导弹。【原文：Hypersonic weapons are so fast, their speed can change the surrounding air molecules. They can carry a nuclear warhead, fly low and be hard to detect. They’re at the center of escalating competition between the US on one side and Russia and China on the other. And their use in combat has raised alarms. Ukraine claimed that Russia used a hypersonic missile to attack Kiev in early 2024.
